GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by a given column(defaults to created_at), ordered by a given order(defaults to DESC), limited to a given limit and on the page denoted by the query 'p'

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article specified by given id

article.title: UNCOVERED: catspiracy to bring down democracy
article.author: rogersop
article.body: Bastet walks amongst us, and the cats are taking arms!

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves the comments associated with a specific article id. Comments are paginated by 'limit'(number of comments per page) and 'p'(page number to return)

comments.body: This is an example of a comment
comments.author: exampleOscar

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to the database associated with a specific article

body.body: This is an example of a new comment

comment.body: This is an example of a new comment
comment.author: exampleOscar

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the vote count on a given article

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Removes the comment denoted by the given comment id

GET /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Fetches the comment denoted by the given comment id

comment.body: Goku is much stronger than Luffy
comment.author: PwrLvlArbiter

GET /api/users.description: Fetches the array of users from the database

GET /api/users/:username.description: Fetches the user associated with the given username
